name: NS-Advisor
0:
”Alexa, open n. s. advisor”
”when is the next train from amsterdam rai”
”trains from schiphol airport”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. s. advisor
des: "Nederlandse Spoorwegen" also known as NS, is the principal passenger railway operator in the Netherlands. The Alexa skill "NS-Advisor" is able to forecast the time table of all the trains leaving in next one hour from any station, asked by the user. The skill is activated by the word "NS Advisor".
